The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Monday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Hawks also secured a superior rebounding advantage , out - rebounding the Magic 42 - 40 . The Hawks were led by Paul Millsap , who went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding four rebounds and a blocked shot as well . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists over that span , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Al Horford also had a strong showing , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and two steals . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 13 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Al Horford finished with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 0 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and two steals . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 13 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Al Horford finished with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 0 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and two steals . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 13 rebounds . Both DeMarre Carroll and DeMarre Carroll reached double figures in points as well with 15 and 15 points respectively . The Magic received most of their production from Nikola Vucevic , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the free throw line to score 21 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 29 rebounds over his last two matchups . Victor Oladipo did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The only other Magic player to reach double figures in points was Tobias Harris , who posted 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 37 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Miami Heat on Friday .

Along with the strong start , the Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 43 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were led by Kevin Love , who went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding three rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Matthew Dellavedova also played well , finishing with 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 12 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 29 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Iman Shumpert was a big factor in the win as well , as he finished with 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and two steals in 29 minutes . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 assists on the year . Iman Shumpert was the other big contributor for the Cavs , finishing with 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and two steals in 29 minutes off the bench . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so it was good to see him get back on track . Tristan Thompson added 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds of his own . The Wizards were led by Martell off the bench , who scored a team - high of 20 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds in 36 minutes . It was a season - high in points for the guard , who 's averaging only 9 points on the year . Ramon Sessions was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and six assists . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists over that span , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Ramon Sessions added 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and six assists as well . The Cavaliers ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Monday .
The Los Angeles Lakers ( 5 - 23 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 17 ) 111 - 107 on Friday . The Lakers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the win . The key for Los Angeles was their defense , as they held the Nuggets to 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant , who tallied 31 points , three rebounds and five assists in the win . Jordan Clarkson also played well , as he tallied 19 points , eight rebounds , two assists and three steals in the win . Jordan Clarkson also played well off the bench , as he scored 19 points to go along with eight boards . The Lakers will look to play better when they host the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday . The Nuggets played this game without Emmanuel Mudiay and Emmanuel Mudiay , but they simply did n't have enough bullets to beat the Lakers . Will Barton led the team with 25 points and also snatched down eight rebounds . Gary Harris scored 21 of his own , while also grabbing a rebound and a block . Nikola Jokic recorded a double - double , as he amassed 15 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . The Nuggets will look to bounce - back when they host the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in their next game .

The Mavericks ( 20 - 30 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the win . Seth Curry finished second on the team with 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . McCollum led the team in scoring , as he dropped 28 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting . Evan Turner was second on the team , providing 24 points , four rebounds and three assists . Portland will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers .

The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 31 - 26 right away in the first quarter . He 's had a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 54 points , 12 rebounds and four steals . He 's had a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 54 points and 12 rebounds . The Hornets were led by Gordon Hayward , who tallied 36 points , nine assists and five rebounds in the loss . Trey Burke also had a nice game , as he tallied 25 points , three rebounds and two assists . Rudy Gobert was the only other Jazz player in double figures , as he accumulated 14 points , 14 rebounds , five assists and two blocks . The Jazz will look to bounce - back against the Toronto Raptors on Monday in their next game . The Hornets have been one of the best defenses in the NBA this season and they nearly pulled out another upset here . Kemba Walker led the team with 52 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds and dishing out eight assists . Marvin Williams was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 19 points and seven rebounds . The Hornets will look to keep this momentum going against the Orlando Magic on Monday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 28 - 1 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 8 ) 89 - 83 on Tuesday . The Warriors came into this game as one of the best defenses in the NBA , but they were able to prevail with a much needed win . The key for Golden State was their defense , as they held the Cavaliers to 32 percent from the field and 17 percent from three - point range . The Warriors were led by LeBron James , who tallied 25 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two blocks in the loss . Kevin Love recorded a double - double , as he totaled 10 points and 18 rebounds . Kevin Love was the only other Cavalier with more than 10 points , as he collected 10 points , 18 rebounds , four assists and two blocks . The Cavaliers will look to bounce - back when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday in their next game . The Warriors played this game without Draymond Green and didn’t miss a beat , but they simply did n't have enough bullets to beat the Warriors . Draymond Green had another good game , as he collected 22 points , 15 rebounds and seven assists in the win . Stephen Curry also played well , as he accumulated 19 points , seven rebounds and seven assists in the win . No other player on the roster had more than 10 points , five rebounds or seven assists . The Warriors will look to build off this win when they play the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday in their next game .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 12 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 36 ) 101 - 83 on Monday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 27 - 20 right away in the first quarter . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the 76ers went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies also forced the 76ers into 23 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 17 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 58 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . Zach Randolph was also a big factor in the win as well , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , 14 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Zach Randolph finished with 17 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , 14 rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 15 points and 11 rebounds . Vince Carter was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) , six rebounds and two steals . He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Vince Carter , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) , six rebounds and two steals in 24 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Houston Rockets on Friday .

The Spurs ( 5 - 1 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the win . The key for the Jazz was their defense , as they held the Pacers to 43 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range . The Jazz were led by Paul George , who tallied 48 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals in the win . Rodney Stuckey also played well , as he tallied 23 points , three rebounds and three assists . George Hill was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 10 points , five assists , two rebounds and four steals . The Pacers will look to bounce - back against the Toronto Raptors on Monday in their next game . The Jazz got a huge performance from Derrick Favors , who tallied 35 points and 13 rebounds in the loss . Gordon Hayward also played well , as he tallied 22 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals in the win . Trey Burke also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 19 points and seven assists . The Jazz will look to bounce - back against the Toronto Raptors on Monday in their next game .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 107 - 91 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Monday . The Cavaliers ( 32 - 14 ) came into this game as a rare road favorite and they left no doubt with this near wire - to - wire win . The key for Cleveland was their defense , as they held the Thunder to 37 percent from the field and 23 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Cleveland winning that battle , 51 - 37 . The Thunder also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Oklahoma City , while committing three less turnovers . The Thunder ( 28 - 20 ) have now won four - straight games , as they continue to climb down the standings . The key for New Orleans was their shooting , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while holding the Timberwolves to just 47 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who tallied 21 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals in the loss . Karl-Anthony Towns also played well , as he totaled 20 points and 13 rebounds in the defeat . Ricky Rubio also played well , as he tallied 15 points and four assists . The Timberwolves will look to keep up the good form against the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday . The Pelicans played this game without Anthony Davis and they didn’t miss a beat . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he accumulated 35 points , seven rebounds and two blocks in the win . Tyreke Evans also played well , as he amassed 13 points , three rebounds and five assists . Jrue Holiday was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 19 points and nine assists . The Pelicans will look to keep this momentum going against the Orlando Magic on Monday .
The New York Knicks ( 30 - 43 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 36 - 35 ) 106 - 94 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Knicks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 31 - 27 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went just 42 percent from the floor and a meager 24 percent from deep . The Knicks also out - rebounded the Bulls 45 - 34 , giving them even more of an advantage . Carmelo Anthony led the way , going 9 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . Kristaps Porzingis did n't have his best game offensively , as he went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his third double - double over his last four games , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 9 rebounds per game . Jose Calderon chipped in with 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and seven assists as well . He 's now averaging 17 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Carmelo Butler did his best to keep the Bulls in this game , going 9 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding three assists and two steals . He 's combined for 54 points over his last two games , as he 's really stepped it up offensively for the Bulls . Jimmy Butler shot the ball well , going 7 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding three assists , three steals and a block . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists over that span , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Taj Gibson added 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds of his own . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Bulls will travel to Boston to play the Celtics on Wednesday .

The Celtics ( 10 - 7 ) came in to Monday 's contest as losers of five of their last six , but were able to pull out a much needed win against a shorthanded Celtics ( 5 - 12 ) squad . The Heat ( 5 - 12 ) jumped out to a 19 - point lead after the first quarter and never looked back , outscoring the Heat ( 5 - 12 ) by a 27 - 12 margin in the first quarter . However , the Celtics ( 5 - 12 ) were able to pull away in the second and third quarters , outscoring the Heat ( 5 - 12 ) by a 27 - 12 margin over the final 12 minutes . Jae Crowder was next with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Tyler Zeller provided 10 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a block . The Celtics head back home to face off with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday evening , while the Heat remain home to face the Detroit Pistons on Saturday evening .

He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 assists on the year . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Suns shot 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from long range , as they cruised to the win . Smith finished with eight points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , five rebounds and three blocked shots , while Jones had 11 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and three blocked shots . It was a career - high in points for him , who 's only reached double figures in points one other time this season . The Clippers ( 28 - 14 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the upset win . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Miami winning that battle , 54 - 45 . Tyler Johnson led the way for Miami , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds and five assists . Goran Dragic finished second on the team , accruing 17 points , six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Willie Reed recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 14 points , three rebounds , 10 assists and two blocks . On deck for Miami is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . The Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Kent Bazemore was a nice spark off the bench , providing nine points and two rebounds on 3 - of - 7 shooting . Atlanta will be in action again on Tuesday , as they play the Washington Wizards on the road .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 129 - 101 , at Pepsi Center on Monday . The Nuggets ( 32 - 35 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a monster effort to beat this Lakers team . In fact , the Nuggets outscored the Lakers , 32 - 20 , in the fourth quarter . Shooting was the difference in the game , with Denver shooting 54 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while Los Angeles went just 43 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . The Nuggets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 36 assists to 15 turnovers , while the Lakers committed 16 turnovers to 17 assists . The Nuggets ( 20 - 47 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Ivica Zubac led the team in scoring , as he dropped 25 points and 11 rebounds on 12 - of - 15 shooting . Jordan Clarkson finished second on the team , accruing 19 points , two rebounds and three assists . Brandon Ingram was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 14 points and 12 rebounds . D'Angelo Russell led the starters with 10 points , two rebounds , three assists and three steals . The Lakers ( 32 - 35 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Jamal Murray led the team in scoring , as he dropped 22 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting off the bench . Nikola Jokic finished second on the team , totaling 18 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Mason Plumlee recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points and 10 rebounds . Will Barton led the bench with 22 points , two rebounds and six assists .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) 121 - 116 on Friday . In a battle between two of the best offenses in the NBA , the Timberwolves were able to prevail with a huge road win . Defense was key for the Wolves , as they held the Suns to 49 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range . The Suns were led by Devin Booker , who tallied 30 points and five assists in the defeat . Devin Booker also had a nice game , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds and five assists . Alex Len recorded a double - double off the bench , as he totaled 14 points and 13 rebounds . The Suns will look to bounce - back against the Toronto Raptors on Monday in their next game . This gives Minnesota their 10th win in their last eight games and they continue to fall deeper out of the playoffs . Andrew Wiggins led the team with 32 points , while also providing five rebounds and three blocks . Karl-Anthony Towns was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 27 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Zach LaVine was the only other player in double figures , as he amassed 15 points and three rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to keep this momentum going against the Orlando Magic on Monday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 0 - 1 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 112 - 94 on Saturday . The Trail Blazers came into this game as one of the worst defenses in the league , but they were able to prevail with an easy win . The key for Portland was their shooting , as they shot 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pelicans to 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The Trail Blazers were led by Anthony Davis , who tallied 25 points and 10 rebounds in the defeat . Ryan Anderson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 21 points and nine rebounds off the bench . Ryan Anderson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 21 points and nine rebounds off the bench . McCollum led the team with 37 points , while also providing six rebounds and one assist . Damian Lillard was the only other starter in double figures , as he accumulated 21 points , five rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Ed Davis recorded a double - double off the bench , as he double - doubled in a 12 - point , 11 - rebound performance . The Trail Blazers will look to start a new winning - streak on Friday when they host the Indiana Pacers .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Utah Jazz , 104 - 74 , at Oracle Arena on Monday . The Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a monster effort to escape with an easy win . In fact , Golden State held the Jazz to 36 percent shooting from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Warriors winning that battle , 50 - 37 . The Warriors ( 18 - 11 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Golden State Warriors , 128 - 119 , at Oracle Arena on Saturday evening . The Warriors ( 23 - 16 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run to pull out the win . The key for the Grizzlies was their shooting , as they shot 49 percent from the field , 39 percent from three - point range and 74 percent from the free - throw line . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Grizzlies winning that battle , 47 - 28 . The Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Mike Conley carried the load , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , totaling 23 points , five rebounds and three assists . Tony Allen recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and six steals . Troy Daniels was the only bench player in double figures , as he dropped 12 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting . The Grizzlies ( 31 - 6 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Stephen Curry was the player of the game , as he accumulated 40 points , three rebounds and six assists . Draymond Green collected 11 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals .
